description: For issues related to prompt template assets (PTA) and detached prompt template assets (DTPA) in a project.
For issues related to Watson Machine Learning (WML) models. Also for issues related to Deployment Spaces.
For issues related to the evaluation of a model or PTA, or any issue related to the Openscale service.
For documentation issues related to the AI factsheet documentation, also known as AIFS docs.
For issues related to the github issue creator.
For issues related to CAMS or factsheet service. If you cannot determine which repo to use, use this as the default.
